GUI

Class MazeWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • GUI.BaseWindow
        • GUI.MazeWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, View

    public class MazeWindow
extends BaseWindow
    MazeWindow class extends BaseWindow define the main screen(shell) functionality define all the button, widgets and other windows
    Author:
    Maor Shmueli
